sentences.en: A large portico provides a suitably impressive entrance to the chapel.
sentences.cn: 小教堂入口处宽敞的柱廊相当壮观.

sentences.en: And the threshold gate next to the portico facing the temple was one rod deep.
sentences.cn: 门槛,就是挨着向殿的廊门槛,宽一竿.

sentences.en: Different types of architecture require different portico spaces are illustrated as different spatial contents.
sentences.cn: 各种类型的建筑对门厅空间有着不同的要求,表现为不同的空间形态.

sentences.en: It was a low building, like a small convalescent home, with a driveway that passed under a portico.
sentences.cn: 那是一座低矮的楼房，就像一个小疗养院，在门廊的下面有一条车道。

sentences.en: Its alcoves, its projecting walls and its portico had the same measurements as the others.
sentences.cn: 33卫房和柱子,并廊子都照先前的尺寸.

sentences.en: Jn. 10:23 And Jesus was walking in the temple in the portico of Solomon.
sentences.cn: 约十23耶稣在殿里所罗门的廊下行走.

sentences.en: On Tuesday morning, he and first lady Laura Bush will greet Obama and his wife, Michelle, at the storied mansion's front portico and see them in for a brief visit.
sentences.cn: 周二早上，他和第一夫人劳拉-布什将在这座多层建筑的前门廊会见奥巴马及其夫人米歇尔，并带领他们进行一个短暂的参观。

sentences.en: Portico Colonnaded porch or entrance to a structure, or covered walkway supported by regularly spaced columns.
sentences.cn: 建筑物有柱的走廊或入口, 或有一定间隔的柱子支承的带顶信道.

sentences.en: Seven steps led up to it, with its portico opposite them.
sentences.cn: 登七层台阶上到这门, 前面有廊子.

sentences.en: Splendid carriages would draw up under the portico , and visitors would be constantly coming and going.
sentences.cn: 豪华马车会停到门廊下, 而且总是有客人来来往往.

sentences.en: The gateway and its portico had openings all around.
sentences.cn: 门洞两旁与廊子的周围都有窗棂.

sentences.en: There are two rows around the palace portico a magnificent towering, majestic momentum.
sentences.cn: 宫殿四周有两排柱廊,巍峨壮丽, 气势雄伟.

sentences.en: We stood on the North Lawn gazing with wonder at her grand portico.
sentences.cn: 我们站在南草坪上惊奇地盯着白宫那巨大的圆柱门廊。

trans.tran_en: a covered entrance to a building, consisting of a roof supported by  pillar s
